attributes.action: Stop taxing overtime, work beyond 40 hours a week or outside contracted hours
attributes.additional_details: We think this could boost productivity and could be an incentive for people to get back into work. We also believe it could help employers to combat short staffing.
attributes.background: We want the government to stop income tax and national insurance contributions on income that is regarded as overtime, outside contracted hours or past 40 hours per week.
